title: For my Yu
text:
If I didn't ..^600see you that day
       I think I ^600won't^200 be so sad
       so sad
       won't ^200be cry
       But^600 If^200 I won't meet you
       I won't^200 know^600 so happy
       so^200 soft
       so ^200lovely
       so^200 warm
       so^200 happy^200 feeling
       ^600Can you forgive me?^600......I love Yu!
